title: Configuration for Rush's build cache.
description: For use with the Rush tool, this file provides configuration options for cached project build output. See http://rushjs.io for details.

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

buildCacheEnabled.description: Set this to true to enable the build cache feature.

cacheProvider.description: Specify the cache provider to use

cacheEntryNamePattern.description: Setting this property overrides the cache entry ID. If this property is set, it must contain a [hash] token. It may also contain a [projectName] or a [projectName:normalize] token.

retryCacheRequest.description: When using a cloud storage for the cache retry failed requests

waitDuration.description: The duration in seconds to wait between requests (defaults to 2 seconds)

exponential.description: If true will send requets with exponential backoff, e.g. 2, 4, 8, 16 seconds if wait duration is 2 seconds (defaults to false)

storageAccountName.description: (Required) The name of the the Azure storage account to use for build cache.

storageContainerName.description: (Required) The name of the container in the Azure storage account to use for build cache.

azureEnvironment.description: The Azure environment the storage account exists in. Defaults to AzurePublicCloud.

blobPrefix.description: An optional prefix for cache item blob names.

isCacheWriteAllowed.description: If set to true, allow writing to the cache. Defaults to false.

s3Bucket.description: (Required unless s3Endpoint is specified) The name of the bucket to use for build cache (e.g. "my-bucket").

s3Endpoint.description:
(Required unless s3Bucket is specified) The Amazon S3 endpoint of the bucket to use for build cache (e.g. "my-bucket.s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com" or "http://localhost:9000").
This shold not include any path, use the s3Prefix to set the path.

s3Region.description: (Required) The Amazon S3 region of the bucket to use for build cache (e.g. "us-east-1").

s3Prefix.description: An optional prefix ("folder") for cache items. Should not start with /

isCacheWriteAllowed.description: If set to true, allow writing to the cache. Defaults to false.
